hackathon-description-text: The Siam Innovation District (SID): Tech Talent, nurtures talents and develops innovations that transforming how Thais live learn and play, recognizes the importance of Such a problem. It has opened a project to improve the knowledge to the people who are interested in solving the problem to use it to solve problems with their own work. But to be knowledgeable throughout the training period. The SID Tech Talent project has come up with the concept of SID Academe Hackathon so that the trainees can apply the knowledge to solve the problem of data management. Including the presentation of new ideas. To create their own business

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Dr. Kid is a successful serial entrepreneur. He founded MCFIVA in 2011 and manages multi-million advertising campaigns for Fortune 500 companies in various industries in Thailand and SEA region. Krungsri RISE)

PhD in Operation Research from Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT), he used to work at Facebook as a Data Scientist for several years. He is now a MD at Skooldio and a Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning

PhD in Machine Learning from Max Planck Institute for Intelligent Systems, Germany. He is a lecturer at the Department of Mathematics, Mahidol University, also a research scientist affiliated with the Empirical Inference Department at Max Planck Institute

MS in Computer Science Carnegie Mellon University. He worked at Microsoft Redmond (US) and Thailand for many years as a software development manager. Also was director of engineering for backend team at Agoda. He is now building his own startup

She holds a PhD study, her project was supporeted by the US national science on a PHEV charging station location project. Her company, CORALINE, is a consulting company focusing on using Big data and machine learning to transform Data into Insight.

Tareef is Founder and CEO of people^2, a people analytics startup. He has a decade's worth of experience working in the tech startup scene in Southeast Asia where he has built and led a handful of startups.

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
40% Machine Learning Algorithm Code & Explanation
30% Software Architecture & Software Development
20% Business Model
10% Presentation

hackathon-description-header: let's make an awesome data products together
